verses.verse: O <S%H3068>Lord<s%>, <S%H3198>rebuke<s%> me not in your <S%H639>anger<s%>, neither <S%H3256>chasten<s%> me in your hot <S%H2534>displeasure<s%>.
Have <S%H2603>mercy<s%> upon <S%H3068>me<s%>, O Lord; for I am <S%H536>weak<s%>: O <S%H3068>Lord<s%>, <S%H7495>heal<s%> <S%H6106>me<s%>; for my bones are <S%H926>troubled<s%>.
My <S%H5315>soul<s%> is also <S%H3966>severely<s%> <S%H926>troubled<s%>: but <S%H3068>you<s%>, O Lord, how long?
<S%H7725>Return<s%>, O <S%H3068>Lord<s%>, <S%H2502>deliver<s%> my <S%H5315>soul<s%>: oh <S%H3467>save<s%> me for your <S%H2617>mercies<s%>' sake.
For in <S%H4194>death<s%> there is no <S%H2143>memory<s%> of <S%H7585>you<s%>: in the grave who shall give you <S%H3034>thanks<s%>?

I am <S%H3021>weary<s%> with my <S%H585>groaning<s%>; all the <S%H3915>night<s%> make I my <S%H4296>bed<s%> to <S%H7811>swim<s%>; I <S%H4529>water<s%> my <S%H6210>couch<s%> with my <S%H1832>tears<s%>.
My <S%H5869>eye<s%> is <S%H6244>consumed<s%> because of <S%H3708>grief<s%>; it waxes <S%H6275>old<s%> because of all my <S%H6887>enemies<s%>.
<S%H5493>Depart<s%> from <S%H6466>me<s%>, all you workers of <S%H205>iniquity<s%>; for the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> has <S%H8085>heard<s%> the <S%H6963>voice<s%> of my <S%H1065>weeping<s%>.
The <S%H3068>Lord<s%> has <S%H8085>heard<s%> my <S%H8467>supplication<s%>; the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> will <S%H3947>receive<s%> my <S%H8605>prayer<s%>.
Let all my <S%H341>enemies<s%> be <S%H954>ashamed<s%> and <S%H3966>severe<s%> <S%H926>troubled<s%>: let them <S%H7725>return<s%> and be <S%H954>ashamed<s%> <S%H7281>suddenly<s%>.
